availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John E. Croley (Henderson Co and Webster Co. ky, farmer )

body.p: Henderson County and Webster County, Kentucky, student and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Benjamin Croley and Rilla Croley. Student in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 2, p. 336B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 507.
